project_abstract.cdata: The main objectives of this Small Scale Enterprise (SSE) Project are as follows.  First, new employment opportunities will be generated.  Second, Zairian entrepreneurship will be developed.  Third, the participation of financial intermediaries will be increased through large branch networks in the development of SSEs.  This will contribute to the decentralization of economic activity.  Finally, Zaire's ability to prepare, appraise and supervise SSE projects will be developed.  These objectives will be supported by a package of credit, technical assistance and training specifically tailored to the needs of enterprises in Zaire.
